text.en: Homage to you, Lord of the World!
In the vastness of clear light, awareness and emptiness inseparable,
text.en-trans: riktong zungjuk ösal chenpö bub

text.en: Lies the innate primordial nature, wisdom mind of the sugatagarbha.
text.en-trans: lhenkyé nyukma deshek nyingpö tuk

text.en: To see you Avalokiteśvara, in your saṃbhogakāya form, is of the deepest meaning and moment;
text.en-trans: tongwa dönden longku chenrezik

text.en: I bow to you, the guide for all beings in the three realms:
text.en-trans: kham sum drowé drenpa khyö chaktsal

text.en: Bless me to become a bodhisattva, just like you!
text.en-trans: gyalsé khyerang tabur jingyi lob

text.en: Your body is like the pure, bright autumn moon,
text.en-trans: gang ku tönké da zhön sarpa la

text.en: Your major and minor marks of perfection akin to the image of the hare that holds the moon in its embrace.
text.en-trans: tsenpé yönten ridak zhönnü khyü

text.en: At your heart, the mudrā that joins saṃsāra and nirvāṇa,
text.en-trans: khordé nyamjor chakgya tukkar dzé

text.en: In your hands, mālā and white lotus, in utter beauty there you stand:
text.en-trans: drang treng pekar dzin ching drengbur zhuk

text.en: Bless me to become a bodhisattva, just like you!
text.en-trans: gyalsé khyerang tabur jingyi lob

text.en: Your speech with its sixty wondrous qualities sounds as sweet as a tamboura,
text.en-trans: gang sung yenlak drukchü tambura

text.en: As perfect in its undulating tones as the song of the kalaviṅka bird,
text.en-trans: kalapingké gyü dzok nyenchuk tril

text.en: Proclaiming teachings that distil the truth of all the yānas.
text.en-trans: tekpa kün gyi döndü chö dra drok

text.en: I bow before you, master of the path of ripening and liberation:
text.en-trans: mindrol lam gyi dakpo khyö chaktsal

text.en: Bless me to become a bodhisattva just like you!
text.en-trans: gyalsé khyerang tabur jingyi lob

text.en: Your mind is ever-present, changeless—all complexity is stilled in its expanse.
text.en-trans: gang tuk pomé trö kün nyerzhi long

text.en: With the qualities of the two knowledges all perfected, the power of your compassion
text.en-trans: khyen nyi yönten cha dzok tukjé tsal

text.en: Radiates extraordinary enlightened activities
text.en-trans: lüchen chi dang khawa ripa la

text.en: To beings everywhere, above all in Tibet. To you I bow:
text.en-trans: trowé trinlé mejung khyö chaktsal

text.en: Bless me to become a bodhisattva, just like you!
text.en-trans: gyalsé khyerang tabur jingyi lob

text.en: Simply hearing your name ends all discord and decline;
text.en-trans: tsen tsam töpé mitün güpa sel

text.en: Simply thinking of you frees us from the fear of lower realms.
text.en-trans: drenpa tsam gyi ngendrö jik lé drol

text.en: One and only friend to all six classes of sentient beings,
text.en-trans: dro druk yichen kün gyi nyen chikpo

text.en: Supreme and special deity, our protector, before you I bow:
text.en-trans: lhakpé lha chok gönpo khyö chaktsal

text.en: Bless me to become a bodhisattva, just like you!
text.en-trans: gyalsé khyerang tabur jingyi lob

text.en: The flaws to be discarded you have driven far, far away;
text.en-trans: pangjé drima tadak ring du dor

text.en: The qualities to be cultivated you have demonstrated, every single one.
text.en-trans: drubjé yönten malü ngön du dzé

text.en: It’s miracles you perform, yet never is there anything incongruous to be seen.
text.en-trans: tong na mitün mepé dzutrul chen

text.en: Sublime Lord of the World, to you I bow!
text.en-trans: pakpa jikten wangchuk khyö chaktsal

text.en: Bless me to become a bodhisattva just like you!
text.en-trans: gyalsé khyerang tabur jingyi lob

text.en: E ma! The vast power of your aspirations is why
text.en-trans: ema, khyé ni mönlam tutsenpé

text.en: It’s you I turn to, as my refuge, my source of trust, and no-one else.
text.en-trans: dak la kyabné ré tö zhenmé do

text.en: Now is the time: hook me with your compassion!
text.en-trans: tukjé chakkyü zungwé dü la bab

text.en: Bless me to become a bodhisattva just like you!
text.en-trans: gyalsé khyerang tabur jingyi lob

text.en: All of us living through this dark age of decay,
text.en-trans: dak sok nyikma nga dö semchen kün

text.en: Are tortured with no break by karma’s unbearable misery.
text.en-trans: zömé lé kyi dukhé taktu nar

text.en: And as I wander through saṃsāra, one life upon another,
text.en-trans: khorwa lugu gyü du khajam na

text.en: It’s to you I pray, Avalokiteśvara: look on me with your compassion,
text.en-trans: solwa deb so pakpé tukjé zik

text.en: And bless me to become a bodhisattva, just like you!
text.en-trans: gyalsé khyerang tabur jingyi lob

text.en: Driven by addiction to mindless distractions,
text.en-trans: dak ni bakmé lé la gompé tü

text.en: I have strayed so far from your sight, your grace, your protection.
text.en-trans: gön khyö gyepé chen ré ring du song

text.en: And now when I face the surging waves in this ocean of suffering,
text.en-trans: dukngal chuwö nyermar chöpé tsé

text.en: It’s to you I pray Avalokiteśvara: look on me with your compassion,
text.en-trans: solwa deb so pakpé tukjé zik

text.en: Bless me to become a bodhisattva just like you!
text.en-trans: gyalsé khyerang tabur jingyi lob

text.en: When I’m bewildered about how to let saṃsāra go and seek nirvāṇa,
text.en-trans: khordé nyi kyi langdor tsul la mong

text.en: Endlessly clinging to the face of my flighty beloved,
text.en-trans: namyeng gamé zhin la takpar chak

text.en: And I repeat the same reckless behaviour day and night,
text.en-trans: nyintsen lokpé chöpé la da tsé

text.en: It’s to you I pray Avalokiteśvara: look on me with your compassion,
text.en-trans: solwa deb so pakpé tukjé zik

text.en: Bless me to become a bodhisattva just like you!
text.en-trans: gyalsé khyerang tabur jingyi lob

text.en: When the glamour of youth is trampled underfoot by the army of months and years,
text.en-trans: langtsö dzepa lodé mak gi chom

text.en: The tree of vitality is splintered by the axe of the Lord of Death,
text.en-trans: la tsé jönpa shinjé taré sü

text.en: And the lifeline of liberation withers away,
text.en-trans: tarpé soktsa tramor jepé tsé

text.en: It’s to you I pray, Avalokiteśvara: look on me with your compassion,
text.en-trans: solwa deb so pakpé tukjé zik

text.en: Bless me to become a bodhisattva, just like you!
text.en-trans: gyalsé khyerang tabur jingyi lob

text.en: As I stumble, unsteady, on shaky steps among the six pāramitās,
text.en-trans: parchin druk gi langtsö gompa khyor

text.en: My listening, contemplating and meditation still immature,
text.en-trans: tö sam gompé natsö ché cher tra

text.en: And I am obsessed with tasks just futile and meaningless,
text.en-trans: ngalwa dönmé chöpa lhurlen tsé

text.en: Then it’s to you I pray, Avalokiteśvara: look on me with your compassion,
text.en-trans: solwa deb so pakpé tukjé zik

text.en: Bless me to become a bodhisattva, just like you!
text.en-trans: gyalsé khyerang tabur jingyi lob

text.en: When the face of five wisdoms is covered by five poisons,
text.en-trans: yeshe nam ngé zhinré duk ngé drib

text.en: The eyes to see innate primordial wisdom go blind,
text.en-trans: rangjung yeshe tawé dren jé long

text.en: And I’m left shrouded in the dark of karma and habits,
text.en-trans: lé dang bakchak münpar tumpé tsé

text.en: Then it’s to you I pray, Avalokiteśvara: look on me with your compassion,
text.en-trans: solwa deb so pakpé tukjé zik

text.en: Bless me to become a bodhisattva, just like you!
text.en-trans: gyalsé khyerang tabur jingyi lob

text.en: Ordinary people like me, foolish and naive,
text.en-trans: khyabpa dujé dukngal gyi narwé

text.en: Are tormented by the pervasive suffering of conditioning,
text.en-trans: jipa sosö kyewö lüchen kün

text.en: And when I’m submerged in this ocean—the results of my evil karma,
text.en-trans: lé ngen drebü tso chen dolwé tsé

text.en: I pray to you, Avalokiteśvara: look on me with your compassion,
text.en-trans: solwa deb so pakpé tukjé zik

text.en: Bless me to become a bodhisattva just like you!
text.en-trans: gyalsé khyerang tabur jingyi lob

text.en: Once I have trained my mind in bodhicitta, both aspiration and action,
text.en-trans: mönjuk changchub sem la lojong né

text.en: And perfected the qualities of the ten stages and five paths,
text.en-trans: sa chu lam ngé yönten tarchin té

text.en: Let me attain the enlightened state with its ten powers,
text.en-trans: tob chu ngawé gopang nyé né kyang

text.en: And serve as a guide, a leader, for all living beings.
text.en-trans: drowa drenpé depön jepar shok

text.en: Then let any who have heard my teachings,
text.en-trans: gang gi dak la lek shé töpa am

text.en: Or made a connection with me through seeing, hearing, remembering or speaking,
text.en-trans: tong tö dren rek tam gyi drelpa tsün

text.en: Be purified of their karma, even acts of immediate retribution.
text.en-trans: tsammé lejang ngensong go khek né

text.en: May the doors to the lower realms be closed for them, and may they be reborn in the exquisite Potala paradise!
text.en-trans: zhing chokpo tala ru kyewar shok
